Package com.CMPUT301W24T32.brazmascheckin.models

Class FirestoreDB

java.lang.Object
com.CMPUT301W24T32.brazmascheckin.models.FirestoreDB
public class FirestoreDB extends Object
The FirestoreDB class provides access to Firebase database instances and collection references through static methods. It includes methods for obtaining the Firestore database instance, collection references for events and users, as well as methods for interacting with Firebase Storage and deleting events.
